the Philadelphia 76ers beat the Denver Nuggets 108-97 Tuesday night in Allen Iverson 's first game against his former team. It was weird to see him wearing a white jersey and we're wearing black,'' Kyle Korver said. I said to one of our coaches that it is so weird to see him on the other side. It wasn't really a good feeling at all. He's a great player and he meant a lot to Philadelphia. Allen Iverson scored 30 points on 10-of-24 shooting before getting tossed for his second technical with 1:44 remaining. Afterward, he said the loss disappointed him because he feels the Nuggets are the better team. Allen Iverson 's best shots

at the buzzer was short. Grant Hill , who led the Magic with 25 points, had hit a similar shot to tie the game at 103 with 12 seconds left, but Allen Iverson answered that with the game-winner. They wanted it a little more than we did and that's a little disappointing, Grant Hill said. Allen Iverson finished 15-of-25, including three 3-pointers, but he was hardly alone in scoring from the perimeter. Reserve Kyle Korver had 28 points on 10-of-13 shooting, while Andre Iguodala and Chris Webber each added 11 for Philadelphia
